titles.title: Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2647) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2010 for military activities of the Department of Defense, for military construction, and for defense activities of the Department of Energy, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year, to provide special pays and allowances to certain members of the Armed Forces, expand concurrent receipt of military retirement and VA disability benefits to disabled military retirees, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-289, by Ms. Slaughter.
All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. Considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 119.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in House

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 808.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 188 (Roll no. 765).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/8/2009--Passed House amended. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2647 (National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2010).
